data.title: Literature Archives
data.text:
Kavisiromani Lekhnath Paudyal

A commemorative postage stamp on Kavi Shiromani Lekhnath Paudyal (1884–1966) : Issued by Nepal Issued on Dec 29, 1966 Issued by : His Majesty’s Government, Postal Services Department, Nepal Philatelic Bureau, Kathmandu Stamp design by : S. D. ‘Ashanta’ Type : Stamp, Postal Used Denomination : 15 Paisa Colour : Blue

335

0

0

Acharya Mahavir Prasad Dvivedi

A commemorative postage stamp on the Birth Anniversary of Acharya Mahabir Prasad Dwivedi, an Indian Hindi writer and editor, represents 2nd phase of Modern Hindi literature, Dwivedi Yug, between Bharatendu Yug and Chhayavad Yug : Issued by India Issued on May 15, 1966 Issued for : The Indian Posts

677

0

1

Kambar

A commemorative postage stamp on Sage Kavichakravarthi Kamban, an Indian Tamil Hindu poet, author of Ramavataram (Kamba Ramayanam), based on Valmiki‘s Ramayana : Issued by India Issued on Apr 5, 1966 Issued for : The annual Kambar Festival will be celebrated in April 1966. The P & T

359

0

1

India on Vidyapati 1965

Information Sheet for the Commemorative Postage Stamp of Mahakavi Vidyapati Thakur, compared with Dante in Italy and Chaucer in England : Issued by India Issued on Wednesday, Nov 17, 1965 Issued for : The P&T Department will issue a special commemorative stamp on the 17th November 1965

0

0

Ashanta Type : Stamp, Postal Used Denomination : 15 Paisa Colour : Brown Madder Size : 4.06 cms x 2.28 cms Perforation : 14½ x 14 Paper : Unwatermarked adhesive stamp paper Number : Half

Bhanubhakta Acharya

A commemorative postage stamp on Adikavi Bhanu Bhakta Acharya, the first poet of the Nepali language : Issued by Nepal Issued on 1962 Type : Stamp, Postal Used Denomination : 5 Paisa Colour : orange brown Name : Bhanubhakta Acharya Born on 1814 at Chundi Ramgha, Ghasikuwa Tanahun district, Nepal Died on 1868 at

Indonesia on the Ramayana

Complete Set of 6 nos of commemorative postage stamps on the Scenes from Ramayana Ballet : Issued by Indonesia Issued on Jan 15, 1962 Issued for : Ramayana Ballet [sendratari ramayana] Picture : Different Characters from Sendratari Ramayana in Indonesia. 30 s – Djataju, 40 s – Hanuman, 1 r – Dasamuka, 1.50 r – Kidang Kentiana, 3 r –

Fairy Tales

Complete Set of 6 nos of postage stamps on the Fairy Tales : Issued by Bulgaria Issued on Oct 10, 1961 Picture : Different Fairy Tales :- 2 s – The Golden Girl, 8 s – The Living Water, 12 s – The Golden Apple, 16 s – Krali–Marko, Hero,

Subramania Bharati

A commemorative postage stamp on the death anniversary of Mahakavi Chinnaswami Subramania Bharathiyar, pioneer of modern Tamil poetry and one of the greatest Tamil literary figures of all time : Issued by India Issued on Sep 11, 1960 Type : Stamp, Postal Used Colour : Dark
